APPEAL_ACCEPTED:
# __Your appeal has been accepted!__
- Please join our official [Support Server](https://discord.gg/XPsQKJjeD7) and create a ticket in the https://discord.com/channels/863226120245215262/959176115723837530 channel to advance your case
- A staff member will attend to you as soon as possible, please refrain from directly messaging or mentioning staff members in any channel regarding your ticket. Breaking this rule can lead to a permanent suspension from our service and Discord Server
APPEAL_DENIED:
After investigating your case we have come to the conclusion to reject your appeal. Your blacklisted status will not be overruled and all new appeals from here on out will be dismissed.

- Sofi Management

BLACKLISTED_USER:
# <:banhammer:1109864225259671614> __You have been blacklisted for violating Sofi's rules!__

**A list of possible reasons that may have caused this:**
```CSS
- Interacting with Sofi on multiple accounts (Alting)
- Selling or Buying entire Discord accounts
- Scamming other users
- Taking advantage or being involved with any of the above activities
```

:link: [Appeal your blacklist](<https://sofi.gg/appeal>)
:link: [Support Server](https://discord.gg/sofi)
